channel.title: Char folder - (isn't one) - only dat files. Please help
channel.description:
Ok, first off.
No one flame me... yes i am a newb. i tried to find the answers in the search bar, tried a few possible finds. none found.
Ok, so i only got dat files, i open with wordpad or text pad and it's all encrypted,
Can i some way decompile these? or what codes shall i put in to make my server save the chars in text pas form aswell as dat files.
i appreciate all help Thanks.
